svg.class: m h-full w-full p-2 lg:p-4 zoom-transition
svg.style: clip-rule: evenodd; fill-rule: evenodd; shape-rendering: geometricprecision; text-rendering: geometricprecision; transform-origin: 0px 0px 0px; transform: matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0);

path.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1.92; stroke-dasharray: none;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 35px; font-family: Arial; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.04em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.02em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);

line.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.04em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);

line.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(102, 102, 102); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;
fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(102, 102, 102); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.04em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.02em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);

path.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;
fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.04em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.02em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);

path.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;
fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 30px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.04em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 30px; font-family: Arial; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);

line.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;

text.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 30px; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: -0.04em; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0);

line.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2px; stroke-miterlimit: 10;

g.text: Click a section to see details

svg.script:
<![CDATA[
function showSectionInfo(evt) {
    var g = evt.currentTarget;
    var id = g.getAttribute('data-section-id');
    var rows = g.getAttribute('data-rows');
    var spr = g.getAttribute('data-seats-per-row');
    var total = g.getAttribute('data-total-seats');
    var price = g.getAttribute('data-current-price');
    var avail = g.getAttribute('data-available');
    
    var info = document.getElementById('section-info');
    if (info) {
        while (info.firstChild) info.removeChild(info.firstChild);
        
        var lines = [
            'Section ' + id,
            'Rows: ' + rows + ' | Seats/Row: ' + spr,
            'Total Seats: ' + total,
            'Price: $' + price,
            'Available: ' + (avail === 'true' ? 'Yes' : 'No')
        ];
        
        lines.forEach(function(line, i) {
            var tspan = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg', 'tspan');
            tspan.setAttribute('x', '25');
            tspan.setAttribute('dy', i === 0 ? '0' : '18');
            tspan.textContent = line;
            info.appendChild(tspan);
        });
    }
}
]]>
